title: Pop Colorture  Zach Smothers

constellations_other.name: Communicating colour
constellations_other.description: An exploration of colour on-screen inspired by Technicolor supervisor, Natalie Kalmus.

description: Colorist Zach Smothers brings 1950s and 60s sitcoms back to life, aiming to “bring colours and film tones into harmony, and create realistic color palettes that match the familiar look of film”.
description_for_label: Colorist Zach Smothers brings 1950s and 60s sitcoms back to life, aiming to “bring colours and film tones into harmony, and create realistic color palettes that match the familiar look of film”.
